Title: Reparations
Writer: Bill Dubuque (created by), Chris Mundy, Mark Williams (created by), Ning Zhou (staff writer)
Actors: Jason Bateman, Laura Linney, Sofia Hublitz, Skylar Gaertner
Plot: Ruth's dad gets out of jail. Approval for a riverboat casino calls for Wendy's political skills. The Mexican cartel demands reparations from the Snells.
